# IOHardwareCursorDescriptor | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Kernel ](/documentation/kernel)

- [ IOKit Fundamentals ](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals)

- [ IOHardwareCursorDescriptor ](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor)

- [ IOKit Fundamentals ](/documentation/kernel/iokit_fundamentals)

-  IOHardwareCursorDescriptor 

Type Alias# IOHardwareCursorDescriptor

macOS 10.0+

```
typedef struct IOHardwareCursorDescriptor IOHardwareCursorDescriptor;
```

## [Topics](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor#topics)

### [Instance Properties](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor#1609183)

[`bitDepth`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386893-bitdepth)Number bits per pixel, or a QD/QT pixel type, for example kIO8IndexedPixelFormat, kIO32ARGBPixelFormat.[`colorEncodings`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386201-colorencodings)An array pointer specifying the pixel values corresponding to the indices into the color table, for indexed pixel types.[`flags`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386648-flags)None defined, set to zero.[`height`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386242-height)Maximum size of the cursor.[`majorVersion`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386364-majorversion)Set to kHardwareCursorDescriptorMajorVersion.[`maskBitDepth`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1385901-maskbitdepth)Unused.[`minorVersion`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1385828-minorversion)Set to kHardwareCursorDescriptorMinorVersion.[`numColors`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386811-numcolors)Number of colors for indexed pixel types.[`specialEncodings`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1385842-specialencodings)Array of pixel values for each supported special encoding.[`supportedSpecialEncodings`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1385860-supportedspecialencodings)Mask of supported special pixel values, eg. kTransparentEncodedPixel, kInvertingEncodedPixel.[`width`](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor/1386493-width)Maximum size of the cursor.## [See Also](/documentation/kernel/iohardwarecursordescriptor#see-also)
